meanings.definition: Having a specified kind or number of parts or features.
meanings.sent1: The robot had a complected design with many intricate parts.
meanings.sent2: She admired the complected pattern on the quilt.
meanings.sent3: The complected puzzle was challenging to solve.
meanings.sent4: Her complected necklace was a beautiful work of art.
meanings.sent5: The complected map showed all the different routes.

meanings.definition: To bring together or combine parts into a whole.
meanings.sent1: He complected the ingredients to make a delicious soup.
meanings.sent2: The team complected their efforts to finish the project on time.
meanings.sent3: She complected the pieces of the puzzle to reveal the picture.
meanings.sent4: The artist complected various colors to create a stunning painting.
meanings.sent5: The chef complected flavors to create a unique dish.

meanings.definition: To twist or interlace (strands of hair) into a braid or knot.
meanings.sent1: She complected her hair into a beautiful braid for the party.
meanings.sent2: He complected his daughter's hair before school.
meanings.sent3: The stylist complected the model's hair for the fashion show.
meanings.sent4: She complected colorful ribbons into her hair for a festive look.
meanings.sent5: The dancer complected her hair to keep it neat during the performance.
